misc
Class DisjointSetNode

java.lang.Object
  misc.DisjointSetNode

public class DisjointSetNode
extends java.lang.Object

Disjoint sets of type Node manager.
Used in Bounded Max Sum when executing Kruskal algorithm.

Author:
Michele Roncalli
